name: Blind Shot -Competition
description:
This game is maid after the original game (Link will be here when its public)

The competition is for people who are willing to play the game survive for a few minutes each difficulty. Only requiernments are to be able to record your screen and join the discord server. Once both is finished please upload the clip into the channel named #share-play.

Just join the discord server Here

Subscribe to the dev channel Here

Before you play it is good to know that some things are still in development.

  • Audio
  • Settings Button
  • Click Delay
